group.name: Women workshops & gatherings - to connect, heal and grow.

description:
Do you find yourself challenged with dating issues or unsatisfying relationship patterns?

Do you find yourself pursuing emotionally unavailable people over and over again?

Does your current relationship status affect your self-esteem?

Herewith you are cordially invited to take some time-out for yourself in a small, safeguarded and comforting circle of women: to let go of the past, to reflect upon patterns & assumptions held, to learn from each other, to reset your energies, to gather courage and wisdom to start the journey of courtship and love

 

 Clarity – Discover your values and grow your self-confidence by creating your personal love map and learning how to navigate it, learn more about what type of person you are in relationship and become aware of your patterns

Boldness – Create a clear vision for your ideal life and relationship, find out what you want from life & love

Wisdom – Train your impact and presence to become the queen of your life, learn about the phases of courtship, become skilled at moving towards action to be found by love.

  This 1 ½ day weekend workshop will take place in Brussels, Centre la Sagesse Interieure Rue General Leman, 32, 1040 Bruxelles - near Place Jourdan:  

 

Saturday,[masked] from 14:00-17:30

Sunday,[masked]  from 10:00 -18:00

The workshop fee of €135 includes rental fee for venue, hand-outs, coffee, tea and snacks.

 

Due to limited places prior registration is required.
name: Attracting the Love you want while living a full and vibrant life!

group.name: Women workshops & gatherings - to connect, heal and grow.

description:
Here's the thing: Society and culture have gotten a bit out of balance: too much focus on individual agency and too little emphasis on community and collaboration. We love the masculine but we’ve created too much of a good thing. If feminine energy, in women, in men and in society at large has been repressed, then, in part, it’s because we’ve allowed that to happen, even if only at a very unconscious level. It’s our responsibility to rise as women and to rediscover what we have to give.

As women, we're designed, through our very bodies, to literally hold space within which new life can be created. These days though, the world needs both holding and creativity on a much larger scale. Let's use our extraordinary capacities: let's collectively hold space for humanity as a whole. Leadership, in this 21st century will often be invisible. These monthly gatherings of sharing and guided meditation are your chance to make a difference, right here, right now.

 

Women need to sit in circles, not only for the purpose of healing, but because we also need replenishment. Women need to go deep.  Sitting in circle nourishes the soul. 

There are many ways and many reasons to sit in circle. At its very core, a sacred circle of women is an opportunity to be loved and held in a way that only women can provide. The circle itself represents a sacred symbol that has been honored throughout time. It is a reminder of the sacredness of the circle of life, the seasons, sunrise to sunrise, the sun, moon, stars, and earth, all things round. This is a Women’s Circle. This implies that we will be doing the reconnecting and rediscovering together. Just as leadership is often invisible, it is now also often collective. The sharing and the meditations will be guided, but the wisdom will emerge from the group as a whole. Our individual stories will reveal patterns that are present in the entire group, and that are important not just to us, but to women around the world. There is something magical about a circle. Geometrically it encompasses more space than any other shape. Within it, one sets out on a journey and returns having never left one’s seat. Whenever we engage in an act of ritual or ceremony that has been shared throughout time, we are the beneficiary of all the goodness that has come from it. The circle, in and of itself, is imbued with lifetimes of profound wisdom. Circle also allows that everyone within the circle is equal. There is no hierarchy in circle. Everyone and every expression is equally valued. We learn so much from one another. We witness each other, allowing ourselves to be seen and heard, honoured, loved and enjoyed. These things go a long way toward strengthening us individually and collectively.

What you may expect:  Learn more about circle practice and story telling. Enter deeper into your female body through dance, stretching, free flow of movement, touch.  This practice is to open our bodies to more of the feminine energy and receive nourishment from each other, strengthening, relaxing, healing and nourishing our bodies and souls. Rituals vary according to the season. We explore and practice being empowered, free and deeply feminine at the same time, holding the vision of a fully realized, awakened female expression on Earth.
name: Women's Circle - A monthly gathering to reconnect with our calling as women

group.name: Women workshops & gatherings - to connect, heal and grow.

description:
YOU are cordially invited to the next Women's Circle...

 Exploring the sacred…

In a circle of women we are exploring a sacred and real way of gathering together, being in “the temple of feminine flow”. Here we tap into the space of connecting with our own bodies and each other, a truly nourishing space for the feminine heart to melt into.

Co-creating…

Together we are creating a feminine oasis where we can step into a different rhythm and discover the patterns that emerge as we share and weave our stories, while sitting in circle. Come with an open mind, bring your curiosity, your unique self and allow yourself to experience the magic of temple practices while expressing your feminine essence.

Practicing…

Entering deeper into our divine female bodies through dance, stretching, free flow of movement.  This practice will help open our bodies even more to feminine energy and will help us receive nourishment from each other, strengthening, relaxing, healing and nourishing our bodies and souls. Seasonal rituals may take place. Learn more about circle practice and storytelling.  The temple practices are designed by women for women, they are a spiritual practice that embraces and enhances our feminine nature, instead of asking us to deny or transcend it. In this embracing of our feminine nature we are restoring a natural balance between the masculine and the feminine within ourselves and in the world. We explore and practice being empowered, free and deeply feminine at the same time, holding the vision of a fully realized, awakened female expression on Earth.

Circle welcomes all women that feel called to participate, whether just once or every month. Do bring along your mother, daughters, aunt, friend or colleague. You are warmly invited to join us at the monthly Women's circle @ Espaces asbl.

Cost per gathering : €15.

To register, please send your name, email address, phone number and the date(s) of the gathering(s) you wish to attend to Katrin: [masked]

8 Participants will be accepted per gathering. Cancellations are possible for free up until 1 week  before the actual date. After that a  50% cancellation fee is charged. 

Location:  Avenue de la Rennaissance 40, 1040 Etterbeek  - if you stand facing the main entrance of the Dominican Church, on your right hand side enter the courtyard & follow the path up to the door

Public Transport: Line 1, 5 get off at Metro-stop: Merode // Bus: 61 – stop 'Chevalerie' ,

                               Bus: 22, 27,61,80 - stop: Merode + 10 minute walk

 

Arrival time: 18:30 Doors close at 19:00
name: Women's Circle - A monthly gathering to reconnect with our calling as women

name: Women's Circle

group.name: Women workshops & gatherings - to connect, heal and grow.

description:
Dear Women,

you are warmly invited to the upcoming meet-up in sacred circle space.


Exploring the sacred…

In a circle of women we are exploring a sacred and real way of gathering together, being in “the temple of feminine flow”. Here we tap into the space of connecting with each other, a truly nourishing space for the feminine heart to melt into.

Co-creating…


Together we are creating a feminine oasis where we can step into a different rhythm and discover the patterns that emerge as we share our stories. Come with an open mind, bring your curiosity, your unique self and allow yourself to experience the magic of temple practices while expressing your divine feminine essence.


Practicing…

Learn more about circle practice, storytelling and the laws of the universe. We explore and practice being empowered, free and deeply feminine at the same time, holding the vision of a fully realized, awakened female expression on Earth.

Practical Details:


The event will take place in a private home in Etterbeek (near Metro Merode & Tram 83, Bus 27,80) and the address will be made known to registered guests.

Weather allowing we will sit on the terrace, beneath the sky and the stars.


In case of rain we will be inside. Please bring along a blanket or a cushion if you wish.


Arrival time: from 18:15 onwards. A light snack will be provided, cookies and tea will be available, too.


Start of circle at 19:00


I am looking forward to welcoming you!
name: Women's circle - a space to connect, share, be, exchange, resource

group.name: Women workshops & gatherings - to connect, heal and grow.

description:
A 2 day weekend intensive, interactive and practical seminar to develop your Self.
September 7 and[masked] in the centre of Brussels
You will identify the form your inner voice takes: judgment, critic...
 You will recognize what your emotional reaction is to your inner voice, and what your personal history is.
 You will identify the different ways you use when engaging with your inner voice.
 You will observe your inner voice, and learn to suspend judgment.
 You will look deeper, and figure out what happens when your inner voice has become silent.

Your trainer: Douwe Nutterts is a teacher of Essence, and psycho-spiritual work. He has been a teacher of the Diamond Logos and has been involved in working with the superego for the last 13 years. He has been a student of the Ridhwan School in the USA for 6 years and he studied with Sandra Maitri in England for 3 years.
http://www.psychospiritueelwerk.com/index.php

Price: € 140 (coffee/tea, cookies during breaks included)
For reservation and/or further information please contact : [masked]
name: Workshop: Do you want Your Inner Voice to continue to run the show?

Co-creating…

Together we are creating a feminine oasis where we can step into a different rhythm and discover the patterns that emerge as we share our stories. Come with an open mind, bring your curiosity, your unique self and allow yourself to experience the magic of temple practices while expressing your divine feminine essence.

Practicing…

Learn more about circle practice and storytelling. Entering deeper into our divine female bodies through dance, stretching, free flow of movement. Seasonal rituals may take place. The temple practices are designed by women for women, they are a spiritual practice that embraces and enhances our feminine nature, instead of asking us to deny or transcend it. In this embracing of our feminine nature we are restoring a natural balance between the masculine and the feminine within ourselves and in the world. We explore and practice being empowered, free and deeply feminine at the same time, holding the vision of a fully realized, awakened female expression on Earth.

Practical details

The Circle welcomes all women that feel called to participate, whether just once or every month. Do bring along your mother, daughters, aunt, friend or colleague.

Cost per gathering : €15.

Please register in advance for easier planning.

Location: This time round we will gather at a private home in Woluwé St. Pierre. The address will be communicated to registered guests only.  

Public Transport: Metro line 5 (Direction Herman Debroux) to Thieffry. Then take bus 36 – get off at stop ‘Mouette’ and 3 minute walk. Or take Bus 36 departing from Schumann.

Arrival time: 18:30 salty snacks, bread & spread, cookies and tea will be served

Start of circle  at 19:00

name: Women's circle

group.name: Women workshops & gatherings - to connect, heal and grow.

description:
You are warmly invited to our next Women’s circle. Come and meet other women in sacred circle space. For a moment you may drop your role as mother, wife, professional, freelancer, daughter …and simply be yourself. No matter wether you are in a good or in a bad mood – wether your life goes well or wether you are facing challenges! We all are somewhere in our lives.

In sacred circle space – we take a break, to bathe in the divine feminine energy and to resource our soul through storytelling, dancing, singing, laughing.
Here we support each other while celebrating our beauty, wisdom and experiences. We co-create and contribute right from where we are in our lives at present. As we give expression to pain, joy, anger, doubt, fear, happiness, we move through our emotions and step into a greater, renewed version of ourselves.

We explore and practice being empowered, free and deeply feminine at the same time, holding the vision of a fully realized, awakened female expression on Earth. Our topic in May: Who is my female role model? • Please bring along a photo, an object or a quote from your favourite female role model. • Please come dressed in a skirt or other type of feminine dress.
